headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid Netflix Stock Despite Its 28% Surge in 6 Months
summary: NFLX stock surges 28% in 6 months but faces margin pressures, fierce competition from Disney+ and Amazon Prime, and trades at a premium P/E above 5x.

headline: Advisors Capital Boosts Netflix, Inc. (NFLX) Stake as Company Partners with Amazon Ads
summary: Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) is among the high growth mega cap stocks you can buy and hold for the next 3 years.
